mapper.select: select p.prjNo,p.UserNo, PrjName, PrjContent, PrjGoal, StartDate, EndDate, PayDate, EndYN, u.UserId , u.UserName, o.OptNo, o.OptPrice,o.OptContent,o.optName from project p join userinfo u on p.userno = u.UserNo join prjoption o on p.PrjNo =o.PrjNo where o.prjNo = #{prjNo}
mapper.insert: insert into prjoption (prjno, OptName, OptPrice, OptContent) values (#{prjNo.prjNo}, #{optName}, #{optPrice}, #{optContent})
insert into prjoption (prjno, OptName, OptPrice, OptContent) values (#{prjNo.prjNo}, #{addOptName}, #{addOptPrice}, #{addOptContent})
